alert.note: Alert for St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 25 at 7:17AM AKDT until March 27 at 4:00AM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM AKDT MONDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow and blizzard conditons. Additional snow accumulations of 4 to 10 inches. Winds gusting as high as 75 mph. * WHERE...St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast. * WHEN...Until 4 AM AKDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Warning for snow means severe winter weather conditions are expected or occurring. This will make travel very difficult or impossible.

area.areaDesc: St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast
